message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and high quality, we estimate its value to be well above $1200000. However, to facilitate a fair transaction, we are initially offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1500000. We understand that this might be a substantial amount, but we assure you that the investment will yield significant returns and benefits. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions. We look forward to the opportunity to work with you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value and my budget. Would you be willing to consider this offer?
